author: rdonkin
msg: Added support for the more flexible method matching provided by MethodUtils.invokeMethod. It is possible that in some (relative obscure) circumstances, the extra precision of the original method is required and so a property has been added which allows the user to choose which one to use. More flexible method matching is enabled by default (there is a slight possibility that some existing code will be broken by this). Also created test cases.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: rdonkin
msg: Changed object creation factory so that exceptions can be thrown as suggested by Martin Cooper

author: craigmcc
msg: Re-add execution of the XML Rules test as part of the "test" target.
